name: Tarnished Blossoms (Demo)
description:
A newborn robot goes on a quest for mercy.

  • Controls
    • A and D keys to move left and right.
    • Space to jump and progress dialogue.
    • Shift to dodge roll.
    • R to restart the level (after dying).
  • Credits (Alphabetical)
    • andrewa813 (programming).
    • Anika; Itch: Point n' Peaches (art).
    • BrokenCookie69; Itch: BrokenCookie69 (art).
    • Dave (programming).
    • Dolos (programming).
    • Griffin Bates; Itch: Chemist02 (programming/writing/audio/art/level design).
    • LazerStardust (writing).
    • Pau (music).
    • stacksta; Itch: stacksta (art).

Good news! We had such a great time making this that we may keep working on it! Thank you for reading, friends!
